mapper.select: SELECT g.regu_id ,g.task_name ,g.task_purpose ,g.task_cntn ,g.resp_emp_id ,get_emptitle(g.resp_emp_id) as resp_emp_name ,g.cre_type ,get_codename(g.cre_type) as code_name ,g.cre_perd ,g.dept_id ,get_deptname(g.dept_id) as dept_name ,g.rn FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY regu_id ORDER BY task_no) rn ,rs.* ,tc.* FROM task_common tc JOIN regu_stad rs ON (rs.regu_id = tc.standard_no) WHERE rs.cust_no = #{cno} ) g WHERE g.rn = 1 ORDER BY g.regu_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'CRG'||LPAD((NVL((MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(regu_id, -4)))),0) + 1), 4, '0') FROM regu_stad
INSERT INTO regu_stad ( regu_id ,cre_type ,cre_perd ,active ,regu_dt ,resp_emp_id ,cust_no) VALUES( #{reguId} ,#{creType} ,#{crePerd} ,'5D1d' ,SYSDATE ,#{respEmpId} ,#{custNo})
mapper.select: SELECT tc.standard_no ,tc.task_no ,get_deptname(tc.dept_id) as dept_name ,tc.task_name ,tc.task_purpose ,tc.task_cntn ,get_emptitle(rs.resp_emp_id) as resp_emp_name ,get_codename(rs.cre_type) as cre_type ,rs.cre_perd ,tc.task_start_dt ,tc.task_due_dt ,get_codename(tc.prjt_mat) as prjt_mat FROM task_common tc JOIN regu_stad rs ON (tc.standard_no = rs.regu_id) WHERE rs.cust_no LIKE #{cno} AND tc.task_type LIKE '5A2a' AND tc.task_no = #{tno}

SELECT dept_id ,task_emp_id ,dept_name ,get_emptitle(task_emp_id) as task_emp_name ,get_codename(cmplt) as code_name ,cmplt ,DECODE(cmplt, '5F1f', 1, '5F2f', 0) as result FROM task_emps WHERE task_no = #{task_no}

SELECT g.rn ,g.standard_no ,g.task_no ,get_deptname(g.dept_id) as dept_name ,g.task_name ,g.task_start_dt ,g.task_due_dt ,get_codename(g.prjt_mat) as mat_name ,g.prjt_mat ,g.active ,g.cre_type ,g.participants_cnt ,g.pt_cnt FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY tc.task_no DESC) rn ,tc.standard_no ,tc.task_no ,tc.dept_id ,tc.task_name ,tc.task_start_dt ,tc.task_due_dt ,tc.prjt_mat ,rs.active ,rs.cre_type ,te.participants_cnt ,te.pt_cnt FROM task_common tc JOIN regu_stad rs ON (tc.standard_no = rs.regu_id) JOIN (SELECT COUNT(task_no) participants_cnt ,SUM(CASE WHEN cmplt = '5F1f' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) pt_cnt ,task_no FROM task_emps GROUP BY task_no) te ON (tc.task_no = te.task_no) WHERE rs.cust_no = #{cno} AND tc.task_type = '5A2a' ) g WHERE g.rn <= (#{sch.page} * 5) AND g.rn > (#{sch.page} - 1) * 5
SELECT count(*) FROM task_common tc JOIN regu_stad rs ON (tc.standard_no = rs.regu_id) WHERE rs.cust_no LIKE #{cno} AND tc.task_type LIKE '5A2a'
